<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aGVsbG8gYXBpIDI="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="service_specific_var"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="a9f7163b-d17a-42e8-9b75-855ca6f67c08"/>
            <L7p:PolicyName stringValue="Generic API Template"/>
        </L7p:Include>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aGVsbG8gYXBpIDk="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="service_specific_var"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Include>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aGVsbG8gYXBpIFZpbmNlMg=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="service_specific_var"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="a9f7163b-d17a-42e8-9b75-855ca6f67c08"/>
            <L7p:PolicyName stringValue="Generic API Template"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SslAssertion>
                <L7p:RequireClientAuthentication booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:SslAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:HttpBasic/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="~ enforce security checks"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValue="${error_description}"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:Authentication>
                <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
            </L7p:Authentication>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="QXV0aGVudGljYXRpb24gZmFpbGVkLg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error_description"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="~ enforce authz"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="RXJyb3IgZW5jb3VudGVyZWQgaW4gcHJvY2Vzc2luZyB0aGUgcmVxdWVzdC4gUGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHRoZSBTU0cgYXVkaXRzL2xvZ3MvYWRtaW5pc3RyYXRvciBmb3IgbW9yZSBpbmZvcm1hdGlvbiBhYm91dCB0aGUgcHJvYmxlbS4="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error_description"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[{
"errors": [
    {
        "message": "${error_description}"
    }
]
}]]></L7p:Content>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
            <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="200"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <L7p:GatewayGraphQL/>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="==============================================================="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Service: HelloWorld"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Version: 1.0"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Path: /helloWorld/v1/"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Description: A service to say hello."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="NOTE:"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Many values/strings have been hardcoded into the policy. Ideally this should be obtained from a CWP."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="This ensures that a simple data change does not imply a code change."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" This service does not use an OpenAPI or WSDL spec file. Elements are manually tested."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="[Extended Information]"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="==============================================================="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Setup Generic Rate Limit (DDoS/etc. Protection)"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="Setup Generic Rate Limiting"/>
                <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:RateLimit>
                <L7p:BlackoutPeriodInSeconds stringValue="20"/>
                <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edad6436776b4c)${request.clientid}"/>
                <L7p:WindowSizeInSeconds stringValue="10"/>
            </L7p:RateLimit>
        </wsp:All>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Check Authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="Check Authentication"/>
                <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.accept}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="json"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="json"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                        <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[{
   "status":401,
   "error":"Invalid credentials",
   "message":"You no touchy!",
   "path":"${request.url.path}",
   "rid":"${requestId}
}]]></L7p:Content>
                        <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
                        <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="401"/>
                    </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="[JSON Error]"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="[XML Error]"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[<errorResponse>
   <status>401</status>
   <error>Invalid credentials</error>
   <message>You no Touchy!</message>
   <path>${request.url.path}</path>
   <rid>${requestId}</rid>
</errorResponse>]]></L7p:Content>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/xml; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="401"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="[Pre Error Response Example]"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <L7p:HttpBasic>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="[Ensure BasicAuth present]"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
            </L7p:HttpBasic>
            <L7p:SpecificUser>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="[Ensure Local Indentity]"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
                <L7p:UserLogin stringValue="admin"/>
                <L7p:UserName stringValue="admin"/>
                <L7p:UserUid stringValue="00000000000000000000000000000003"/>
            </L7p:SpecificUser>
        </wsp:All>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Setup Security & Request Threat Protection"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="Setup Security & Request Threat Protection"/>
                <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Setup Specific Rate Limiting"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:RateLimit>
                    <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edad6436776b4c)${request.clientid}"/>
                    <L7p:MaxRequestsPerSecond stringValue="10"/>
                    <L7p:WindowSizeInSeconds stringValue="10"/>
                </L7p:RateLimit>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.accept}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="json"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="json"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ewogICAic3RhdHVzIjo0MjksCiAgICJlcnJvciI6IlRvbyBtYW55IHJlcXVlc3RzIiwKICAgIm1lc3NhZ2UiOiJSYXRlIGxpbWl0IGV4Y2VlZGVkLiIsCiAgICJwYXRoIjoiJHtyZXF1ZXN0LnVybC5wYXRofSIsCiAgICJyaWQiOiIke3JlcXVlc3RJZH0KfQ=="/>
                            <L7p:EarlyResponse booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                            <L7p:ResponseStatus stringValue="429"/>
                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[JSON Error]"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[XML Error]"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="PGVycm9yUmVzcG9uc2U+CiAgIDxzdGF0dXM+NDI5PC9zdGF0dXM+CiAgIDxlcnJvcj5Ub28gbWFueSByZXF1ZXN0czwvZXJyb3I+CiAgIDxtZXNzYWdlPlJhdGUgbGltaXQgZXhjZWVkZWQuPC9tZXNzYWdlPgogICA8cGF0aD4ke3JlcXVlc3QudXJsLnBhdGh9PC9wYXRoPgogICA8cmlkPiR7cmVxdWVzdElkfTwvcmlkPgo8L2Vycm9yUmVzcG9uc2U+"/>
                        <L7p:EarlyResponse booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/xml; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        <L7p:ResponseStatus stringValue="429"/>
                    </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="[Post Error Response Example]"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Check Request Size Limit"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:RequestSizeLimit/>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.accept}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="json"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="json"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ewogICAic3RhdHVzIjo0MDAsCiAgICJlcnJvciI6IkJhZCByZXF1ZXN0IiwKICAgIm1lc3NhZ2UiOiJSZXF1ZXN0IGlzIHRvbyBsYXJnZS4iLAogICAicGF0aCI6IiR7cmVxdWVzdC51cmwucGF0aH0iLAogICAicmlkIjoiJHtyZXF1ZXN0SWR9Cn0="/>
                            <L7p:EarlyResponse booleanValue="true"/>

                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>

                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[JSON Error]"/>

                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">

                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[XML Error]"/>

                        <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="PGVycm9yUmVzcG9uc2U+CiAgIDxzdGF0dXM+NDAwPC9zdGF0dXM+CiAgIDxlcnJvcj5CYWQgcmVxdWVzdDwvZXJyb3I+CiAgIDxtZXNzYWdlPlJlcXVlc3QgaXMgdG9vIGxhcmdlLjwvbWVzc2FnZT4KICAgPHBhdGg+JHtyZXF1ZXN0LnVybC5wYXRofTwvcGF0aD4KICAgPHJpZD4ke3JlcXVlc3RJZH08L3JpZD4KPC9lcnJvclJlc3BvbnNlPg=="/>
                        <L7p:EarlyResponse booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/xml; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        <L7p:ResponseStatus stringValue="400"/>
                    </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="[Post Error Response Example]"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="General Threat Protection"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:CodeInjectionProtectionAssertion>
                        <L7p:IncludeBody booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:IncludeUrlQueryString booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Protections codeInjectionProtectionTypeArray="included">
                            <L7p:item protectionType="htmlJavaScriptInjection"/>
                            <L7p:item protectionType="shellInjection"/>
                        </L7p:Protections>
                        <L7p:Target target="REQUEST"/>
                    </L7p:CodeInjectionProtectionAssertion>
                    <L7p:SqlAttackProtection>
                        <L7p:Protections stringSetValue="included">
                            <L7p:item stringValue="OraSql"/>
                            <L7p:item stringValue="MsSql"/>
                        </L7p:Protections>
                    </L7p:SqlAttackProtection>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.accept}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="json"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="json"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ewogICAic3RhdHVzIjo1MDAsCiAgICJlcnJvciI6IkludGVybmFsIFNlcnZlciBFcnJvciIsCiAgICJtZXNzYWdlIjoiQSBwcm9ibGVtIHdhcyBkZXRlY3RlZC4iLAogICAicGF0aCI6IiR7cmVxdWVzdC51cmwucGF0aH0iLAogICAicmlkIjoiJHtyZXF1ZXN0SWR9Cn0="/>
                            <L7p:EarlyResponse booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                            <L7p:ResponseStatus stringValue="500"/>
                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[JSON Error]"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="[XML Error]"/>
                                </L7p:entry>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SslAssertion>
                <L7p:RequireClientAuthentication booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:SslAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:HttpBasic/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:Authentication>
            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
        </L7p:Authentication>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Check the request message size. If the maximum message size needs to be increased change the 'restman.request.message.maxSize' cluster property"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:RequestSizeLimit>
                <L7p:Limit stringValue="${gateway.restman.request.message.maxSize}"/>
            </L7p:RequestSizeLimit>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<l7:Error xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">
    <l7:Type>InvalidRequest</l7:Type>
    <l7:Detail>the specified maximum data size limit would be exceeded</l7:Detail>
</l7:Error>]]></L7p:Content>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/xml; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="400"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:RESTGatewayManagement/>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

clusterProperties.name: keyStore.defaultSsl.alias
clusterProperties.description: Keystore ID and alias of default SSL key, colon delimited.  A keystore ID of -1 means "unspecified".
